name: Tech-Fab Europe e.V.
goal:
The objective of the association is:
1. To promote interests of the European producers of technical fabrics made of glass fibre;
2. to support its members within the scope of collectively interesting issues;
3. to protect and represent common interests of its members towards political, governmental or other institutions;
4. the education and training of its members and their employees;
5. to promote the exchange of economic, sociopolitic al and/or technical experience between the members.
interests: Climate Action, Environment, Fraud prevention, Trade
